title: CD Packaging Inspiration..
content:
Wishing to look through some good ole' cd packaging designs.   
   
Anyone have any good links? I need a little inspiration for this next project!   
   
Thanks,   
   
Hildebrant.
author: Hildebrant

comments.content:
Check out [Dave McKean](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.dreamline.nu/) and [Stanley Donwood](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.slowlydownward.com/)'s work. They are among my favourites.   
   
Also, my mate Frank made [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.yayhooray.com/thread/9032.html) recently, and I quite liked it.

Dave link didnt work ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)   
   
Im really looking for something clean. I do love the 'Frank; work.

Lot of good things on [Asterikstudio](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.asterikstudio.com/asterik_ui/index_frame.html), [Tavis Smith Seampieces](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.seempieces.com/), [P.R. Brown (BAU-DA DESIGN)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.bauda.com/site3/lab_design.html), [We are the Tourist](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.wearetourist.com/main.html).   
   
I have also done some CD's layouts, in fact that's freelancer design mission. Check them here:   
   
MOONSPELL:   
 [1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/moonspell_special.jpg), [2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/moonspell_antidote_vinyl.jpg), [3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/moonspell_antidote_digipak.jpg). Multimedia track: [1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/joseluispeixoto_antidoto1.jpg), [2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/joseluispeixoto_antidoto3.jpg), [3](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/joseluispeixoto_antidoto4.jpg), [4](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/joseluispeixoto_antidoto5.jpg).   
   
CAFFEINE:   
 [jewelcase](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/caffeine_cd.jpg).   
   
BALBURDIA:   
 [digipak 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/balburdia_digipak.jpg), [digipak 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.musicdrops.com/cv/balburdia_digipak2.jpg).   
   
SIGUR R

These guys know how to do a cd:   
 [http://www.pixelgrazer.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.pixelgrazer.com/)   
   
portfolio \> print \> cd packaging   
clicking next gives you lining notes design, not the next project.   
(I say this not because I think you're a moron, just because it took me several minutes to find this

Kyle, there are also some good books on CD design you might check out, like "Cd Art: Innovation in Cd Packaging Design" by Charlotte Rivers.   
   
Adriano, I like the Moonspell stuff.   
   
hhp
Ive always been a sucker for the design of the [Rachels CDs](http://web.archive.org/%C2%92). The first three anyway  I dont have the later stuff. Non-jewel case. Printed here in Chicago IIRC.

Great stuff guys! Kudos!   
Adriano -- enjoy your work! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

4AD -- [http://www.4AD.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.4ad.com/)   
ECM -- [http://www.ecmrecords.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018221900/http:/www.ecmrecords.com/)   
   
Are you wanting the jewel case designs? Maybe I misunderstood. :^/
